productText.text: Crafted with high-quality beef stock that's been simmered with vegetables picked at the peak of freshness
productText.textHTML: Crafted with high-quality beef stock that's been simmered with vegetables picked at the peak of freshness

productText.text:
No MSG added*, no preservatives or artificial flavors

*Except for a small amount of glutamate that naturally occurs in yeast extract

productText.text: Packaged in a resealable twist-cap carton
productText.textHTML: Packaged in a resealable twist-cap carton

productText.text: Swanson® is made from simple, high-quality ingredients you can recognize. Our beef is sourced from farms we trust, and we select the finest vegetables and spices, picked at the peak of freshness. It starts with real beef and bones, then we cook our broths and stocks to perfection to deliver a unique balance of flavor. Use Swanson Broth to add flavor to soups, rice, potatoes, vegetables and stuffing. Or moisten leftovers before reheating.

productText.text: Swanson®  Beef Broth is crafted from high-quality beef and vegetables picked at peak freshness—all of which are cooked perfection to deliver a delicious balanced blend of flavor.
productText.textHTML: Swanson®  Beef Broth is crafted from high-quality beef and vegetables picked at peak freshness—all of which are cooked perfection to deliver a delicious balanced blend of flavor.

productText.text: Swanson® Beef Broth is crafted from high-quality beef and vegetables picked at the peak of freshness that are cooked perfection to deliver a balanced blend of delicious flavor to your recipe. Packaged in a resealable twist-cap carton, get passionate in the kitchen with our all-natural and create sensational beef soup and other great recipes by keeping our trustworthy broth on hand. The best ingredients make the best dishes.
